summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackMoroccanoil Root Boost is a volumizing, spray-on mousse that creates strong texture at the roots before styling with heat, while infusing hair with nourishing argan oil.
details: DetailsBenefitsEnriched with argan oil to nourish hair and scalpFortifies and thickens at the rootLong-lasting voluminous texture with natural-looking finishHelps control staticKey IngredientsArgan Oil: Provides vitamin E, essential fatty acids, and antioxidantsPVP/VA Copolymer: Extends style hold by preventing moisture from being absorbed by the hair shaftPolyquaternium-7: An anti-static agentItem 2644261How To UseShake can well. Spray MoroccanoilÂ® Root Boost generously on towel-dried hair at the roots. Using a round brush, blow-dry in sections, lifting hair away from the scalp.Caution: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves, or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50Â°C (122Â°F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid spraying in eyes. May burst if heated. Protect from sunlight. Avoid fire, flame, and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Dimethyl Ether, Vp/Va Copolymer, Pvp, Peg-45 Palm Kernel Glycerides, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Polyquaternium-7, Benzophenone-4, Tetrasodium Edta, Ppg-5-Ceteth-20, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Carbomer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Polysorbate 20, Parfum/Fragrance, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Hexamethylindanopyran, Linalyl Acetate, Camphor. MORBNTHFC03Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake can well. Spray MoroccanoilÂ® Root Boost generously on towel-dried hair at the roots. Using a round brush, blow-dry in sections, lifting hair away from the scalp.Caution: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves, or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50Â°C (122Â°F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid spraying in eyes. May burst if heated. Protect from sunlight. Avoid fire, flame, and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: Anti-static!!
reviews.comments: This root boost product is great for my daily blowout that I do to my bangs!! My bangs have been uncooperative recently but the anti-static ingredients in this root boost definitely did their job. My hair looks silky smooth again! Gifted by Moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Volume!
reviews.comments: I love Moroccanoil, first time trying their root boost volumizing spray mousse. Leaves my hair smelling good, giving it volume and texture. I spray it on my damp hair before I blow dry it and it gives my hair body and makes it easy to style. Acts as a heat protector and anti frizz. Definitely recommend. Gifted by moroccanoil.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This root boost definitely helps my have get that extra boost it needs, especially after a non wash day. Smells good, and doesn't leave my hair feeling oily or dry. Works really well for both mine and my daughter. Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I love moroccanoil products. This is my first moose for the hair and I received it Complimentary from moroccanoil. I love the smell and how it works. My hair is fine and it works. So I can do my hair in the other ways

reviews.headline: Great hold
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Moroccanoil, but here is my honest review! This root boost has been incredibly useful for special occasions when I want my blowout styles to look big and full! I've used it on some big occasions and it has lasted all night!

reviews.headline: Works great!!
reviews.comments: You do have to spray carefully so you don't use too much product, but it works really well. It didn't make my hair feel hard or crunchy, and the scent is just as amazing as the rest of Moroccanoil's products. This item was kindly gifted by Moroccanoil for review purposes.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: As a person with super fine thin hair this product is an absolute game changer to have in my daily hair routine!!! It lifts my roots so much and gives me so much volume in all my hair styles. Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: The Moroccanoil Root Boost gives instant lift right at the roots without leaving any sticky or stiff residue. It has the same signature scent as the rest of the line, which I love, and it blends easily when blow-drying. My hair feels fuller and has volume that lasts all day, but still looks natural and touchable. Perfect for fine or flat hair that needs a little boost. Gifted by them

reviews.headline: Instant Lift & Volume
reviews.comments: Moroccanoil Root Boost adds instant lift and long-lasting volume to fine and medium hair. Infused with argan oil, it creates strong texture at the roots without weighing hair down, leaving a natural, touchable finish. It gives an instant lift and volume. Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product every hair wash day and the smell of it is not so great but other than that I love this product! It gave me the volume I needed and lasts for more than a day! Complimentary from moroccanoil

reviews.headline: SO GOOD!
reviews.comments: This was gifted by Moroccanoil and I love it. It gives me the perfect amount of volume without messing up the way I style my hair. It also smells SO good and so fresh! I would recommend you try it if you're wanting a product that gives you volume that looks and feels natural.

reviews.headline: Recommend
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil Love the product. I apply it after blow drying my hair to about 80%. Then, I use the brush and the product does miracles. I get nice root volume that lasts me the whole day! Recommend!

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: Gifted by Moroccan Oilâ€” Love this product! Not only does it smell amazing but it actually works so well and doesn't weigh my hair down. It is a very light mousse so it doesn't make my hair feel crunchy or oily. I would recommend for people with thin/fine hair!

reviews.headline: Gives great volume
reviews.comments: Gifted by Moroccanoil ðŸ’™ The Root Boost gives my hair instant lift at the roots, adds body, and holds style all day without stiffness. Perfect for fuller, natural-looking volume! Great for straight and stubborn hair.

reviews.headline: can provide volume to even heavy long hair
reviews.comments: gifted by Morracan oil. I love a large blow out look. I have a lot hair that is down past my hips, it takes a strong root booster to hold it up. This worked great to give my hair the volume I wanted for my blow out and keep it lasting. I will definitely be keeping this in my rotation.

reviews.headline: Must in myday
reviews.comments: What an incredible product ! I love the way leave my hair !!! My girlfriend uses this every day ,we really love it so much ! Smells good and my hair looks amazing ! so so happy about this ! Perfect size because I travel a lot

reviews.headline: Works but you'd need a lot for long hair
reviews.comments: This was gifted by Moroccan Oil. I like how this smells and I think it works, it just takes more product than i initially thought. I have very long hair and it's heavy, so it's possible I just need more product to get a better hold. I do love the scent and think it's easy to use!

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: I've used this stuff and it's fantastic. My hair is usually flat, but the Moroccanoil Root Boost gives me so much lift and volume. It's not sticky or crunchy, and it makes my hair look full and bouncy all day. It's a must-have for me now. Complimentary from moroccanoil

reviews.headline: So good!
reviews.comments: Complimentary from moroccanoil I was excited to try this root boost because I have flat fine hair and I wasn't disappointed! It has the iconic clean morrocanoil scent and wasn't sticky on my hair. It did boost my roots and held the volume until I washed my hair again! This is so good for anyone looking for a good volume boost on their roots!

reviews.headline: Cannot skip this step for your next blowout!
reviews.comments: To preface, I was gifted by moroccanoil BUT they were not joking when they said this spray give you volume.. . because it DOES. I'm not one to use a bunch of extra hair products because I don't believe they do that much for your hair. I was wrong. I used this mousse before blowing out my hair and my hair was, dare I say, the best it has ever looked. I like how it's very easy to use and it doesn't make my hair feel gross as a regular mousse would.

media.headline: can provide volume to even heavy long hair
media.caption: amazing hold

faceoff_positive.comments: Gifted by Moroccanoil in exchange for my honest review. The Moroccanoil Root Boost has quickly become a game-changer in my hair routine. From the very first use, I noticed how easily it lifts the roots and adds instant volume without making my hair feel stiff or crunchy. The lightweight formula gives my hair a natural fullness that lasts throughout the day, yet it still feels soft and touchable. What I love most is how it works even on fine hair like mine â€” it gives structure and body without weighing strands down. It also has that signature Moroccanoil scent, which makes styling feel like a little luxury experience every time I use it. The spray bottle is convenient and precise, allowing me to target the roots directly for maximum lift. A little goes a long way, so even the 75ml size is practical for travel and long-lasting in daily use. Overall, this product delivers exactly what I want in a root booster: reliable volume, lightweight hold, and a polished finish.
faceoff_positive.headline: It's the perfect styling companion

faceoff_negative.comments: This item was complimentary from morrocanoil. I have straight flat asian hair and I love having a volumized look when I can. While I do love this product and want to incorporate it to my daily routine, it can be tough perfecting this without my hair feeling "hair" especially since my hair is thin. I will say that a little (emphasis on little) goes a long way and make sure to spray a few generous inches away from your head. This is a good product but would reach the perfect scale if they can find a way to volumize without leaving my hair hard.
faceoff_negative.headline: Okay for fine hair
